function.name: qtfm_helpdb
function.short: Build or rebuild QTFM searchable help database

long.para: qtfm_helpdb runs a &matlab; function that constructs a searchable database from the QTFM help information. If the database already exists, it is replaced with a newly created version. These databases are specific to the version of &matlab; that created them, so if you upgrade to a new version of &matlab; you should re-run this function. The database is not distributed with the toolbox because of this specific link to the &matlab; version that created it.
